TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataObject

summary.span: 为传送数据提供与格式无关的机制。

span.span: Provides a format-independent mechanism for transferring data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IDataObject`接口由类和拖放操作中。The `IDataObject` interface is used by the class and in drag-and-drop operations. 类中实现时方法允许用户以多种格式的类的实例中存储数据。When implemented in a class, the methods allow the user to store data in multiple formats in an instance of the class. 将数据存储在多个格式增加目标应用程序，您可能不知道，它的格式要求，可以检索存储的数据的可能性。Storing data in more than one format increases the chance that a target application, whose format requirements you might not know, can retrieve the stored data. 若要将数据存储中的实例，调用方法并指定数据格式以`format`参数。To store data in an instance of , call the method and specify the data format in the `format` parameter. 设置`autoConvert`参数`false`如果您不希望存储的数据会在检索时转换为另一种格式。Set the `autoConvert` parameter to `false` if you do not want stored data to be converted to another format when it is retrieved. 调用上的一个实例多次以多种格式存储数据。Invoke multiple times on one instance of to store data in more than one format. 检索存储的数据从通过调用方法并指定数据格式中`format`参数。You retrieve stored data from an by calling the method and specifying the data format in the `format` parameter. 设置`autoConvert`参数`false`以检索存储在指定的格式的数据。Set the `autoConvert` parameter to `false` to retrieve only data that was stored in the specified format. 若要将存储的数据转换为指定的格式，将设置`autoConvert`到`true`，或不使用`autoConvert`。To convert the stored data to the specified format, set `autoConvert` to `true`, or do not use `autoConvert`. 若要确定中存储的数据的格式，使用以下方法。To determine the formats of the data stored in an , use the following methods. - 调用方法来检索的数组中的所有格式的有可用的数据。Call the method to retrieve an array of all the formats in which the data is available. 设置`autoConvert`参数`false`获取仅在其中存储数据的格式。Set the `autoConvert` parameter to `false` to get only the formats in which the data is stored. 若要获取数据存在的所有格式，请设置`autoConvert`到`true`，或不使用此参数。To get all the formats in which the data is available, set `autoConvert` to `true`, or do not use this parameter. - 调用方法，以确定是否可在特定的格式存储的数据。Call the method to determine whether stored data is available in a certain format. 如果不希望存储的数据转换为指定的格式，则设置`autoConvert`参数`false`。If you do not want stored data to be converted to the specified format, set the `autoConvert` parameter to `false`. 请参阅此接口的实现的类。See the class for an implementation of this interface. 请参阅预定义的类数据格式。See the class for the predefined data formats.

summary.span: 检索与指定的数据格式关联的数据。

span.span: Retrieves the data associated with the specified data format.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetData (string format);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetData(string format) cil managed
Public Function GetData (format As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetData(System::String ^ format);
abstract member GetData : string -> obj

param.name: format
param.span: 要检索的数据的格式。

span.span: The format of the data to retrieve.

param.span: 请参见 以获取预定义的格式。

span.span: See for predefined formats.

summary.span: 检索与指定的数据格式关联的数据。

span.span: Retrieves the data associated with the specified data format.

returns.span: 与指定格式关联的数据，或为 。

span.span: The data associated with the specified format, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法不能在指定的格式中查找数据，它将尝试将数据转换为格式。If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，此方法返回`null`。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, this method returns `null`. 若要确定数据是否相关联，或可以转换为一种格式，请调用之前调用。To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call before calling . 调用有关的此实例中存储的数据的有效格式的列表。Call for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this instance. > [!NOTE] > 如果存储时已指定，允许进行转换，并且请求的格式与存储格式兼容，数据可以转换为其他格式。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. 此方法的实现，请参阅。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 此示例使用类，该类实现`IDataObject,`若要演示了如何使用`GetData`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject,` to demonstrate the use of the `GetData` method. 该方法用于检索中存储的数据`myDataObject`，这与`Text`格式。The method is used to retrieve the data stored in `myDataObject`, which is associated with the `Text` format. 该示例假定已创建名为`Form1`和一个名为`textBox1`。The example assumes that you have already created a named `Form1` and a named `textBox1`. [!code-cpp[GetData1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData1/CPP/getdata1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetData1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData1/CS/getdata1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetData1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData1/VB/getdata1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法不能在指定的格式中查找数据，它将尝试将数据转换为格式。If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，此方法返回`null`。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, this method returns `null`. 若要确定数据是否相关联，或可以转换为一种格式，请调用之前调用。To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call before calling . 调用有关的此实例中存储的数据的有效格式的列表。Call for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this instance. > [!NOTE] > 如果存储时已指定，允许进行转换，并且请求的格式与存储格式兼容，数据可以转换为其他格式。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. 此方法的实现，请参阅。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 此示例使用类，该类实现`IDataObject`，以演示了如何使用`GetData`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetData` method. 该方法用于检索中存储的数据`myObject`，这是与特定类型关联`myType`。The method is used to retrieve the data stored in `myObject`, which is associated with a specific type, `myType`. 在消息框中显示的检索到的数据类型。The type of the retrieved data is displayed in a message box. 该示例假定已创建名为`Form1`。The example assumes that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[GetData2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData2/CPP/getdata2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetData2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData2/CS/getdata2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetData2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData2/VB/getdata2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`autoConvert`参数是`true`和此方法找不到指定的格式的数据，它会尝试将数据转换为格式。If the `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format. 如果数据无法转换为指定的格式，或存储数据时`autoConvert`参数设置为`false`，此方法返回`null`。If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`, this method returns `null`. 如果`autoConvert`参数是`false`，此方法返回数据中指定的格式，或`null`如果找不到此格式中的没有数据。If the `autoConvert` parameter is `false`, this method returns data in the specified format, or `null` if no data in this format can be found. 若要确定数据是否相关联，或可以转换为一种格式，请调用之前调用。To determine whether data is associated with, or can be converted to, a format, call before calling . 调用有关的此实例中存储的数据的有效格式的列表。Call for a list of valid formats for the data stored in this instance. > [!NOTE] > 如果存储时已指定，允许进行转换，并且请求的格式与存储格式兼容，数据可以转换为其他格式。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. 此方法的实现，请参阅。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 此示例使用类，该类实现`IDataObject`，以演示了如何使用`GetData`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetData` method. 该示例检索中存储的数据`DataObject`，并使用`autoConvert`参数来指定是否要转换的数据格式。The example retrieves the data stored in a `DataObject`, using the `autoConvert` parameter to specify whether or not to convert the data format. 首先，`myDataObject`使用文本数据创建。First, `myDataObject` is created with text data. 然后此示例尝试两次检索的数据。Then the example tries twice to retrieve the data. 它可以在首次尝试中，来指定作为一个字符串，并设置其格式`autoConvert`参数`false`。In the first trial, it specifies its format as a string and sets the `autoConvert` parameter to `false`. 此试用版失败，并且结果显示在消息框标记为"消息 #1。"This trial fails, and the result is displayed in a message box labeled "Message #1." 在第二个试用版，该示例检索与相同的数据`autoConvert`参数设置为`true`。In the second trial, the example retrieves the same data with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `true`. 此试用版成功，并且结果显示在消息框标记为"Message #2。This trial succeeds, and the result is displayed in a message box labeled "Message #2." 该示例假定你已创建名为`Form1`。The example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[GetData3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData3/CPP/getdata3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetData3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData3/CS/getdata3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetData3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetData3/VB/getdata3.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法来确定此中是否存在一种格式之前调用。Call this method to determine whether a format exists in this before calling . 调用此实例中可用的格式。Call for the formats that are available in this instance. > [!NOTE] > 如果存储时已指定，允许进行转换，并且请求的格式与存储格式兼容，数据可以转换为其他格式。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. 此方法的实现，请参阅。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 此示例使用类，该类实现`IDataObject`，以演示了如何使用`GetDataPresent`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetDataPresent` method. 首先，它创建使用字符串的数据对象和`Text`格式。First, it creates a data object using a string and the `Text` format. 然后它将验证数据是否处在`Text`设置格式，并在消息框中显示结果。Then it verifies that the data is present in the `Text` format and displays the results in a message box. 该示例假定你已创建名为`Form1`。The example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法来确定此中是否存在一种格式之前调用。Call this method to determine whether a format exists in this before calling . 调用此实例中可用的格式。Call for the formats that are available in this instance. 此方法返回`true`时：This method returns `true` when: - `autoConvert`参数是`true`和数据的格式可以转换为适当的格式。The `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and the data is in a format that can be converted to the appropriate format. - `autoConvert`参数是`false`和数据的适当格式。The `autoConvert` parameter is `false` and the data is in the appropriate format. 此方法返回`false`时：This method returns `false` when: - `autoConvert`参数是`true`和此方法找不到数据中指定的格式，并且它不能将数据转换为指定的格式，或存储数据时`autoConvert`设置为`false`。The `autoConvert` parameter is `true` and this method cannot find data in the specified format, and it cannot convert data to the specified format, or the data was stored with `autoConvert` set to `false`. - `autoConvert`参数是`false`，并且数据不存在指定的格式中的此实例中。The `autoConvert` parameter is `false`, and data does not exist in this instance in the specified format. > [!NOTE] > 如果存储时已指定，允许进行转换，并且请求的格式与存储格式兼容，数据可以转换为其他格式。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. 此方法的实现，请参阅。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 此示例使用类，该类实现`IDataObject`，以演示了如何使用`GetDataPresent`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetDataPresent` method. 首先，它创建的数据对象 (`myDataObject`) 使用字符串和`Text`格式。First, it creates a data object (`myDataObject`) using a string and the `Text` format. 然后它将查询与相关联的数据对象`Text`格式，与`autoConvert`参数设置为`false`。Then it queries the object for data associated with the `Text` format, with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`. 此试用版失败，并且结果显示在消息框标记为"消息 #1。"This trial fails, and the result is displayed in a message box labeled "Message #1." 在第二个试用版，它会设置`autoConvert`参数`true`。In the second trial, it sets the `autoConvert` parameter to `true`. 此试用版成功，并且结果显示在消息框标记为"Message #2。This trial succeeds, and the result is displayed in a message box labeled "Message #2." 该示例假定你已创建名为`Form1`。The example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[GetDataPresent3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetDataPresent3/CPP/getdatapresent3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetDataPresent3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetDataPresent3/CS/getdatapresent3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetDataPresent3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetDataPresent3/VB/getdatapresent3.vb#1)]

returns.span: 一组名称，表示此对象中存储的数据所支持的所有格式列表。

span.span: An array of the names that represents a list of all formats that are supported by the data stored in this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以获取支持的数据格式，然后才能调用方法。Call this method to get the supported data formats before calling the method. 请参阅的预定义格式的类。See the class for the predefined formats. > [!NOTE] > 如果存储时已指定，允许进行转换，并且请求的格式与存储格式兼容，数据可以转换为其他格式。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. 此方法的实现，请参阅。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 此示例使用类，该类实现`IDataObject`，以演示了如何使用`GetFormats`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetFormats` method. 首先，它创建的数据对象 (`myDataObject`) 使用字符串和`Text`格式。First, it creates a data object (`myDataObject`) using a string and the `Text` format. 然后它检索所有的数据格式和数据对象中的数据转换格式，并在消息框中显示生成的列表。Then it retrieves all the data formats and data conversion formats in the data object, and displays the resulting list in a message box. 此示例假定你已创建名为`Form1`。This example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[GetFormats1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetFormats1/CPP/getformats1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetFormats1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetFormats1/CS/getformats1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetFormats1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetFormats1/VB/getformats1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string[] GetFormats (bool autoConvert);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string[] GetFormats(bool autoConvert) cil managed
Public Function GetFormats (autoConvert As Boolean) As String()
public: cli::array <System::String ^> ^ GetFormats(bool autoConvert);
abstract member GetFormats : bool -> string[]

param.name: autoConvert
param.span: 值为 时，检索存储在此实例中的数据所关联的或可以转换成的所有格式；值为 时，仅检索本机数据格式。

span.span: to retrieve all formats that data stored in this instance is associated with or can be converted to; to retrieve only native data formats.

summary.span: 获取该实例中存储的数据所关联或可转换到的所有格式的列表，同时使用一个布尔值确定是检索数据可转换到的所有格式，还是只检索本机数据格式。

span.span: Gets a list of all formats that data stored in this instance is associated with or can be converted to, using a Boolean value to determine whether to retrieve all formats that the data can be converted to or only native data formats.

returns.span: 一组名称，表示此对象中存储的数据所支持的所有格式列表。

span.span: An array of the names that represents a list of all formats that are supported by the data stored in this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以获取支持的数据格式，然后才能调用方法。Call this method to get the supported data formats before calling the method. 请参阅的预定义格式的类。See the class for the predefined formats. > [!NOTE] > 如果存储时已指定，允许进行转换，并且请求的格式与存储格式兼容，数据可以转换为其他格式。Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format. 例如，存储为 Unicode 可以转换为文本的数据。For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text. 此方法的实现，请参阅。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 此示例使用类，该类实现`IDataObject`，以演示了如何使用`GetFormats`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `GetFormats` method. 首先，它创建的数据对象 (`myDataObject`) 使用字符串和`UnicodeText`格式。First, it creates a data object (`myDataObject`) using a string and the `UnicodeText` format. 然后，它使两个查询来获取与数据关联的格式。Then it makes two queries to get the formats associated with the data. 在第一个查询中，它会设置`autoConvert`参数`false`： 在这种情况下，返回仅的本机格式数据。In the first query, it sets the `autoConvert` parameter to `false` : in this case, only the native format of the data is returned. 在第二个查询中，它会设置`autoConvert`参数`true`，以便它所获取的格式，包括数据可以转换为的格式列表。In the second query, it sets the `autoConvert` parameter to `true`, so that it gets the list of formats, including the formats that the data can be converted to. 在每种情况下，所得到的列表显示在消息框中。In each case, the resulting list is displayed in a message box. 此示例假定你已创建名为`Form1`。This example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[GetFormats2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetFormats2/CPP/getformats2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GetFormats2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetFormats2/CS/getformats2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GetFormats2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GetFormats2/VB/getformats2.vb#1)]

summary.span: 存储此实例中的指定数据及其关联格式。

span.span: Stores the specified data and its associated format in this instance.

param.name: data

summary.span: 使用此格式的数据类存储此实例中的指定数据。

span.span: Stores the specified data in this instance, using the class of the data for the format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式被派生自数据类。The format is derived from the data class. 会在检索时，存储使用此方法的数据可以转换为兼容格式。Data stored using this method can be converted to a compatible format when it is retrieved. 此方法的实现，请参阅。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 此示例使用类，该类实现`IDataObject`，以演示了如何使用`SetData`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `SetData` method. 首先，创建一个组件 (`myComponent`) 并将其存储在数据对象中 (`myDataObject`)。First, it creates a component (`myComponent`) and stores it in a data object (`myDataObject`). 然后它会检查是否指定的数据存储在数据对象，并在消息框中显示结果。Then it checks whether the specified data is stored in the data object, and displays the result in a message box. 该示例假定你已创建名为`Form1`。The example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[SetData1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SetData1/CPP/setdata1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SetData1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SetData1/CS/setdata1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SetData1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SetData1/VB/setdata1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不知道目标应用程序的格式，您可以使用此方法的多种格式存储数据。If you do not know the format of the target application, you can store data in multiple formats using this method. 会在检索时，存储使用此方法的数据可以转换为兼容格式。Data stored using this method can be converted to a compatible format when it is retrieved. 此方法的实现，请参阅。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 此示例使用类，该类实现`IDataObject`，以演示了如何使用`SetData`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `SetData` method. 首先，它创建的数据对象 (`myDataObject`)，并将字符串存储在对象指定`UnicodeText`格式。First, it creates a data object (`myDataObject`) and stores a string in the object specifying the `UnicodeText` format. 然后它将检索该数据存储在对象指定`Text`格式，以便将数据转换为`Text`格式。Then it retrieves that data stored in the object specifying the `Text` format, so that the data is converted to the `Text` format. 在消息框中显示结果。The result is displayed in a message box. 此示例假定你已创建名为`Form1`。This example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[SetData2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SetData2/CPP/setdata2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SetData2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SetData2/CS/setdata2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SetData2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SetData2/VB/setdata2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不知道目标应用程序的格式，您可以使用此方法的多种格式存储数据。If you do not know the format of the target application, you can store data in multiple formats using this method. 会在检索时，存储使用此方法的数据可以转换为兼容格式。Data stored using this method can be converted to a compatible format when it is retrieved. 此方法的实现，请参阅。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 此示例使用类，该类实现`IDataObject`，以演示了如何使用`SetData`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `SetData` method. 首先，创建一个组件 (`myComponent`) 并将其存储在数据对象中 (`myDataObject`)，并使用`myType`指定数据格式。First, it creates a component (`myComponent`) and stores it in a data object (`myDataObject`), using `myType` to specify the data format. 然后它会检查是否指定类型的数据存储在对象，并在消息框中显示结果。Then it checks whether the data of the specified type is stored in the object, and displays the result in a message box. 该示例假定你已创建名为`Form1`。The example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不知道目标应用程序的格式，您可以使用此方法的多种格式存储数据。If you do not know the format of the target application, you can store data in multiple formats using this method. 此方法的实现，请参阅。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 此示例使用类，该类实现`IDataObject`，以演示了如何使用`SetData`方法。This example uses the class, which implements `IDataObject`, to demonstrate the use of the `SetData` method. 首先，它创建的数据对象 (`myDataObject`)，并将存储`UnicodeText`字符串中，使用`autoConvert`参数设置为`false`。First, it creates a data object (`myDataObject`) and stores a `UnicodeText` string in it, with the `autoConvert` parameter set to `false`. 然后，它检索的对象中存储的数据与相关联的格式，并在消息框中显示结果。Then it retrieves the format(s) associated with the data stored in the object and displays the result in a message box. 与数据关联的唯一格式是`UnicodeText`格式。The only format associated with the data is the `UnicodeText` format. 此示例假定你已创建名为`Form1`。This example assumes that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[SetData4#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SetData4/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SetData4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SetData4/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SetData4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SetData4/VB/form1.vb#1)]
